Iri dengan Kantor PUPR, Wishnutama: Kemenparekraf Kaya Diskotik
07 Nov 2019, 07:25 by Herdi Alif Al Hikam


Menteri Pariwisata dan Ekonomi Kreatif (Menparekraf) Wishnutama Kusubandio/Foto: Rifkianto Nugroho

Jakarta - Menteri Pariwisata dan Ekonomi Kreatif (Menparekraf) Wishnutama Kusubandio mengaku iri karena kantornya kalah bagus dengan Kementerian Pekerjaan Umum dan Perumahan Rakyat (PUPR) yang dipimpin Basuki Hadimuljono.Hal itu disampaikannya saat dimintai komentar mengenai profesi arsitektur dalam dunia ekonomi kreatif. Awalnya dia meminta agar para arsitek bersuara lebih banyak soal desain konstruksi yang dibangun pemerintah, khususnya dalam mengangkat budaya lokal."Jadi memang arsitektur ini bisa jadi daya tarik untuk pariwisata bukan cuma ekonomi kreatif. Saranin kami bagaimana memasuki kultur budaya segala macam ke dalam bangunan, bandara misalnya," ucap pria yang akrab dipanggil Tama, di Hotel Sultan, Jakarta, Kamis (7/11/2019).Dia mencontohkan untuk bandara bisa memasukkan unsur budaya lokal pada bangunannya. Dia mengeluhkan selama ini desain bandara terlalu kaku."Misal bandara, jangan modern semua desainnya, harus unique. Munculkan kesan wah saya holiday banget masuk sini, turis merasa liburan babget di sini. Inilah peran arsitektur," ucap Tama.Dia pun mengeluhkan yang terjadi pada bangunan kantornya. Menurutnya desain kantor Kemenparekraf terlalu kaku."Saya pertama kali ke Sertijab saya masuk gedungnya besi-besi semua nih, ini kok (Kementerian) Pariwisata atau apa nih, kok malah kayak diskotik," ungkap Tama.Dia menyebutkan iri dengan kantor Kementerian PUPR. Menurutnya, kementerian pimpinan Basuki Hadimuljono ini sejuk, hijau, dan tenteram."Saya jealous sama Menteri PU wilayah kantornya hijau, sejuk, dan tenteram. Belum lagi kalau di pariwisata kan depannya suka ada yang demo," keluh Tama. Simak Video "Tanggapan Reza Rahadian soal Bekraf Gabung di Kemenparekraf"[Gambas:Video 20detik](ara/ara)

Envy with the PUPR Office, Wishnutama: Kemenparekraf Rich Discotheque
Nov 7 2019, 07:25 by Herdi Alif Al Hikam


Minister of Tourism and Creative Economy (Menparekraf) Wishnutama Kusubandio / Photo: Rifkianto Nugroho

Jakarta - Minister of Tourism and Creative Economy (Menparekraf) Wishnutama Kusubandio claimed to be jealous because his office was inferior to the Ministry of Public Works and Public Housing (PUPR) led by Basuki Hadimuljono.This was conveyed when asked for comment on the architectural profession in the creative economy. Initially he asked the architects to speak more about the construction designs built by the government, especially in promoting local culture. "So indeed this architecture can be an attraction for tourism rather than just a creative economy. We suggest how to enter cultural culture of all kinds into buildings, airport for example, "said the man who is familiarly called Tama, at the Sultan Hotel, Jakarta, Thursday (11/07/2019). He gave an example for the airport to include elements of local culture in the building. He complained so far the airport design is too rigid. "For example the airport, do not be modern, all the designs must be unique. Give the impression that I am really on holiday here, tourists feel babget holidays here. This is the role of architecture," said Tama. He also complained in the office building. According to him the design of the Kemenparekraf office was too rigid. "I first went to the Sertijab when I entered the iron building, why is this (the Ministry of Tourism) or something, how come it looks like a discotheque," said Tama. According to him, the ministry of leadership of Basuki Hadimuljono is cool, green, and peaceful. "I am honest with the Minister of Public Works, his office is green, cool, and calm. Not to mention that in tourism, the front is like a demonstration," complained Tama.
